timeline.message: Implement storing AST data to program JAR
Improve error handling of the observerbilty collector

timeline.bodyText: I think we need this task for Test and Run command as well
timeline.author: warunalakshitha

replies.bodyText: I think we don't need this for the test. But not sure, we need this for run command. @a5anka Are we trying to observe using run common?
replies.author: hasithaa

replies.bodyText: Actually, I added this to run command. In the future users might need to run with observability features fro advanced debugging use cases with Choreo. Therefore it will be easier for the user if we have this enabled for run command. Isn't it?
replies.author: a5anka

timeline.bodyText:
Shall we move this to createJarTask. AFAIU module jar with entry points should contain those sequence diagram json.
There is writeJarFile in CodeGenerater where we might need to modify that api with those resource files. So we do not need to create Jar File System again.
timeline.author: warunalakshitha

replies.bodyText:
Shall we move this to createJarTask. AFAIU module jar with entry points should contain those sequence diagram json.

CreateJarTask class is delegating the jar creation to backendDriver.execute therefore may be not the best place. And additionally, we use observabilty only to build and run. Therefore isn't it better to have a separate task?
We are already adding the sequence diagram JSON to all module jars with entry points. Refer https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/pull/22222/files/28e3e366af91af5f08c3549d31f73c78986f155d#diff-7c4c3a978dc518ee1571ea5b436a401aR51

There is writeJarFile in CodeGenerater where we might need to modify that api with those resource files. So we do not need to create Jar File System again.
replies.author: a5anka

replies.bodyText: IMO we need to provide an api for all the resources to pack during create module jar. For the moment this is fine.
replies.author: warunalakshitha

timeline.bodyText: Shall we fix licence year and missing licence in other places as well.
timeline.author: warunalakshitha
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,163 @@
+/*
+ * Copyright (c) 2019, WSO2 Inc. (http://www.wso2.org) All Rights Reserved.

timeline.bodyText: We do not recommend to use stream api if performance is critical
timeline.author: warunalakshitha

replies.bodyText: This is not in the critical path AFAIU. Is it ok if I keep this for readability?
replies.author: a5anka

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to encode the json.
timeline.author: warunalakshitha

replies.bodyText: This is to canonicalize the JSON output to ensure that we generate the same JSON when the program does not change. Without this, we observed that the order of items in the JSON changing.
replies.author: a5anka

timeline.bodyText: As a practice, we add @since annotation. Please add that.
timeline.author: hasithaa

replies.bodyText: Added in the latest commit. I didn't have the copyright settings configured. I fixed it in the IDE.
replies.author: a5anka
